name: Polylike
description:
Controls:

ASDW - Movement

SHIFT - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

Polylike is a roguelite dungeon-crawler bullet-hell game with a simple polygon style to it. Fight off curved shapes proving polygons are superior! 

To assist you in shooting through the procedurally generated dungeons, you'll be rewarded with random perks everytime you level up! Be careful on what you pick though, as you can't go back on your choice, so it's best to think of what synergizes better with your selection!

The game is currently in heavy development and will (at least try to) get updated frequently.
